text: Novruz Ismayil oglu Mammadov (; born 15 March 1947) is an Azerbaijani politician and translator. He was Prime Minister of Azerbaijan from April 2018 to October 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * More information Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Azerbaijan Category:New Azerbaijan Party politicians Category:21st-century Azerbaijani people Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Novruz Mammadov
